node.display_long_description:
[Summary]
Swords of Gargantua is a VR sword-action game you can experience in single-player mode or online co-op with up to 3 other players.

Adventure through the Tesseract Abyss floors to beat the giant Gargantua lying in its deepest layer, Floor 101. 

[Features]
・Sharpen your blade and abilities after every fight and take on thrilling battles along your journey. 
・A wide variety of melee weapons are available to help you achieve your own virtual reality sword art action: one and two-handed swords, katanas, axes, maces, boomerangs, shields, etc.
・Enchant your weapons and give them super powers. 
・Use voice chat to communicate while playing with your fellow warriors to take on the enemies in the Tesseract Abyss or join up to 8 players in a lounge for pre or post-game hangouts.
・Sense of immersion enhanced by realistic sound optimized for VR. 
・Enjoy endless content thanks to user-created weapons and battles Mods.
・The game supports cross-buy

node.name: New Weapon Gekirin and Kujo Lychee Birthday!

nodes.title: New VTubers Collaboration Event!
nodes.body_text:
Click on the Event button on the main menu and select "[Challenge] Musubime Yui Enthusiastic Live Performance" to start the event. 
When the total number of Small One enemies defeated during the event period reaches one of the target goals, you will obtain the "Musubime Yui Shield".

Click on the Event button on the main menu and select "[Challenge] Minase Shia Human Extinction Operation" to start the event. 
When the total number of Tank-Veteran enemies defeated during the event period reaches one of the target goals, you will obtain the "Minase Shia Sword".

Click on the Event button on the main menu and select "[Challenge] Makino Monaka's Introduction to Astrophotography" to start the event. 
When the total number of Swordsman-Veteran enemies defeated during the event period reaches one of the target goals, you will obtain the "Makino Monaka Sword".

Event Period
From Thursday, 25th of March (03:00PST) to Thursday, 22th of April (08:00PST)



メニュー内にあるイベントボタンをクリックし「【挑戦】結目ユイの熱狂ライブ」を選択。
イベントをプレイしたユーザーがSmall-Oneを討伐した数の合計が目標数に到達すると、「結目ユイシールド」を報酬として受け取ることができます。

メニュー内にあるイベントボタンをクリックし「【挑戦】水瀬しあの人類滅亡計画」を選択。
イベントをプレイしたユーザーがTank-Veteranを討伐した数の合計が目標数に到達すると、「水瀬しあソード」を報酬として受け取ることができます。

メニュー内にあるイベントボタンをクリックし「【挑戦】巻乃もなかの天体写真入門」を選択。
イベントをプレイしたユーザーがSwordsman-Veteranを討伐した数の合計が目標数に到達すると、「巻乃もなかソード」を報酬として受け取ることができます。

イベント期間
2021年3月25日（木）19:00～2021年4月22日（木）24:00（2021年4月23日（金）0:00）

Discord
Twitter US
Twitter JP

nodes.title: New "Azure Dragon" & "Yinglong" Katanas are here!
nodes.body_text:
Version upgrade information: 
<Ver.1.4.8.34061>
- Added weapons for new event.
- Changed the items in the Adventure shop.
- Added event weapons as result rewards in Adventure mode.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Dragons have returned for the new Lunar Year.
Let's celebrate and win a brand new weapon! Click on the Event button on the main menu and select "[Join Fight] Awakening of the Dragons" to start the event. 
From Friday, 5th of January (02:00PST) to Thursday, 25th of February (23:00PST)

Join our Discord to learn more!

「【共闘】クエスト19殲滅作戦」を開催します。
このイベントは、武器の種類やレベルの使用制限がないイベントとなります。
メニュー内にあるイベントボタンをクリックし「【共闘】クエスト19殲滅作戦」を選択。イベントをプレイしたユーザー全員のポイント数の合計が目標数に到達すると、イベント期間終了後に「青龍」「応龍」を報酬として受け取ることができます。
2021年2月5日（金）19:00～2021年2月25日（木）24:00（2021年2月26日（金）0:00）

node.reviewDescription:
I got this game a while ago and I played it for a bit with friends. The combat is a bit choppy and the game will sometimes lag or even kick you if you dash and swing. They should also change the dash, nearly hit a wall because I was dashing and swinging. 
Overall a good game and would recommend it to anyone. As long as you have an open place to swing freely and you don’t mind hitting walls occasionally.
